org.spongepowered.api.item.merchant

Interface VillagerRegistry


  • public interface VillagerRegistry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VillagerRegistry addMutator(Career career, int level, TradeOfferListMutator mutator)
      Adds the provided TradeOfferListMutator for the given Career and level.
      VillagerRegistry addMutators(Career career, int level, TradeOfferListMutator mutator, TradeOfferListMutator... mutators)
      Adds the provided TradeOfferListMutators for the given Career and level.
      default Collection<TradeOffer> generateTradeOffers(Merchant merchant, Career career, int level, Random random)
      Generates a new List of TradeOffers based on the provided Career, level, and Random.
      default Collection<TradeOfferListMutator> getMutatorsForCareer(Career career, int level)
      Gets the available TradeOfferListMutators for the desired Career and level.
      Multimap<Integer,TradeOfferListMutator> getTradeOfferLevelMap(Career career)
      Gets an immutable Multimap of the Career's registered {code level} to TradeOfferListMutators.
      default List<TradeOffer> populateOffers(Merchant merchant, List<TradeOffer> currentOffers, Career career, int level, Random random)
      Populates the provided List of TradeOffers with potentially new TradeOffers based on the TradeOfferListMutators and level.

      Sets the provided TradeOfferListMutator for the given Career and level.

    • Method Detail

      • getTradeOfferLevelMap

        Multimap<Integer,TradeOfferListMutator> getTradeOfferLevelMap(Career career)
        Gets an immutable Multimap of the Career's registered {code level} to TradeOfferListMutators. Note that the map is immutable and cannot be modified directly.
        Parameters:
        career - The career
        Returns:
        The immutable multimap

      • getMutatorsForCareer

        default Collection<TradeOfferListMutator> getMutatorsForCareer(Career career,
                                                               int level)
        Gets the available TradeOfferListMutators for the desired Career and level.
        Parameters:
        career - The career
        level - The level
        Returns:
        The collection of trade offer mutators, if available

      • addMutator

        VillagerRegistry addMutator(Career career,
                            int level,
                            TradeOfferListMutator mutator)
        Adds the provided TradeOfferListMutator for the given Career and level. Note that the level must be at least 1. There can be multiple TradeOfferListMutators per level.
        Parameters:
        career - The career
        level - The level
        mutator - The mutator to register
        Returns:
        This registry, for chaining

      • addMutators

        VillagerRegistry addMutators(Career career,
                             int level,
                             TradeOfferListMutator mutator,
                             TradeOfferListMutator... mutators)
        Adds the provided TradeOfferListMutators for the given Career and level. Note that the level must be at least 1. There can be multiple TradeOfferListMutators per level.
        Parameters:
        career - The career
        level - The level
        mutator - The mutator to register
        mutators - The additional mutators
        Returns:
        This registry, for chaining

      • setMutators

        VillagerRegistry setMutators(Career career,
                             int level,
                             List<TradeOfferListMutator> mutators)
        Sets the provided TradeOfferListMutator for the given Career and level. Note that the level must be at least 1. There can be multiple TradeOfferListMutators per level. Any previously provided TradeOfferListMutators will be erased.
        Parameters:
        career - The career
        level - The level
        mutators - The mutators to register
        Returns:
        This registry, for chaining

      • setMutators

        VillagerRegistry setMutators(Career career,
                             Multimap<Integer,TradeOfferListMutator> mutatorMap)
        Sets the provided TradeOfferListMutator for the given Career and level. Note that the level must be at least 1. There can be multiple TradeOfferListMutators per level. Any previously provided TradeOfferListMutators will be erased.
        Parameters:
        career - The career
        mutatorMap - The mutator map
        Returns:
        This registry, for chaining

      • generateTradeOffers

        default Collection<TradeOffer> generateTradeOffers(Merchant merchant,
                                                   Career career,
                                                   int level,
                                                   Random random)
        Generates a new List of TradeOffers based on the provided Career, level, and Random.
        Parameters:
        merchant - The merchant
        career - The career
        level - The level
        random - The random
        Returns:
        The generated list of trade offers

      • populateOffers

        default List<TradeOffer> populateOffers(Merchant merchant,
                                        List<TradeOffer> currentOffers,
                                        Career career,
                                        int level,
                                        Random random)
        Populates the provided List of TradeOffers with potentially new TradeOffers based on the TradeOfferListMutators and level. If there are no TradeOfferListMutators registered for the desired level and Career, the list remains unmodified.
        Parameters:
        merchant - The merchant
        currentOffers - The current offers
        career - The career
        level - The level
        random - The random to use
        Returns:
        The list of offers modified
